datastore-cluster
*****************


Description
===========

Use the Oracle Cloud VMware CLI to create SDDCs and manage ESXi hosts
and software. For more information, see Oracle Cloud VMware Solution.


Available Commands
==================

* add-datastore

* attach-to-cluster

* attach-to-esxi-host

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* detach-from-cluster

* detach-from-esxi-host

* get

* list

* remove-datastore

* update
